Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.active

Class Coordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.Behavior
      • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.Executor<ActiveActor>
        • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor.active.Coordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoolCoordinator, ThreadCoordinator
    public abstract class Coordinator
extends Executor<ActiveActor>
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Coordinator class provides a partial implementation of the behavior of the executor actor used for creating and executing active actors.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
